articles.title: Stellantis to receive hefty profit-sharing checks following record North America results - Detroit News
articles.description: Profit-sharing for U.S. workers is based on Stellantis' North American adjusted operating income margin. It increased to 16.4% from 16.3% in 2021.

articles.title: Teck's mining breakup sets the scene for copper takeovers - MINING.COM - MINING.com
articles.description: Teck owns four copper mines in South America and Canada that produced 270,000 metric tons last year.
articles.content: The move almost certainly makes Teck Metals a takeover target when big mining companies are on the hunt for copper as demand for the wiring metal accelerates and a global shortfall looms. BHP Group, … [+1851 chars]
